alert.note: Alert for Evangeline; Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 1:58AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Rapides, northwestern Evangeline, eastern Vernon and northeastern Allen Parishes through 230 AM CDT... At 158 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kurthwood to 7 miles west of Lacamp to near Pitkin. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oakdale, Glenmora, Boyce, Elizabeth, Hineston, Lena, Pitkin, Slagle, Lacamp, Fullerton, Hutton, Clifton, Flatwoods, Otis, Elmer, Kurthwood, Leander, Sieper, Gardner and Calcasieu. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 96 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for central, southwestern and west central Louisiana.
